body.p: WineConf 2005 is coming to Europe! Mark your calendars for April 30th and May 1st and start making travel arrangements. This year's WineConf is being hosted by the University of Stuttgart's Institute of Communication Networks and Computer Engineering. For more info, see the WineConf 2005 web pages. We're currently working on arranging some lodging options, please let us know as soon as possible if you plan on attending.
